\h(《King Ixa'taka》)Isapa, now that you are free, and the Valuans 
are busy looking for Vyse and his friends, 
we can summon the mighty Giant.\e

\h(《King Ixa'taka》)Awaken, Giant of the Forest! I who hold the 
Sacred Green Stone, command you 
to destroy our enemies.\e

\h(《Isapa》)There is no other way for us to save 
the forests and people of Ixa'taka…\e
